page.title: 05A Day At The Office 08.07.85
page.content: My father rose at 7.00 am. and had his {breakfast.}At 8.00 am he left for work. At 9.00 pm he opened the{post and then{prepared cheques}for the bank. At 10.00 am he went to a {management meeting}to plan next weeks business programme. Between 11.00 am and 1 pm he did some{accounting work and then he whet to the{bank}to pay in the cheques. He had his{lunch}on the way. At 2.00 pm he spoke on the{telephone {to head office}and then he did some {accounting work}until about 4.00 pm when he{telephoned}some customers about their bills for meat. At 5.00 pm he{signed some cheques}for posting tomorrow. At 6.00 pm he came{home}and had{tea. He worked in the{garden}until 8.00 pm when he got us ready for bed. He{read and{watched T.V.}until{bed}at 10.00 pm
